tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE savings (
    goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    goal_name VARCHAR(255),
    current_amount DECIMAL,
    target_amount DECIMAL,
    date_created TIMESTAMP,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE savings_goals (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    goal_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    target_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    current_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    progress_percentage DECIMAL,
    completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    savings_goal_id INT REFERENCES savings_goals(id),
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE savings (
    user_id INT,
    goal_name VARCHAR(255),
    goal_amount DECIMAL,
    current_amount DECIMAL,
    goal_progress DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, goal_name)
)

CREATE TABLE savings_history (
    user_id INT,
    goal_name VARCHAR(255),
    action_type ENUM('deposit', 'withdraw'),
    amount DECIMAL,
    date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id, goal_name) REFERENCES savings(user_id, goal_name)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE user_settings (
    user_id INT,
    email_notifications BOOLEAN,
    weekly_report BOOLEAN,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Savings (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	goal_name VARCHAR(255),
	goal_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
	current_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	savings_id INT,
	transaction_date DATE,
	transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
	transaction_type VARCHAR(50)
);
